General.Name: Athena Gold Corp
General.Description: Athena Gold Corporation, an exploration stage company, engages in the acquisition and exploration of mineral resources in the United States. Athena Gold Corporation was formerly known as Athena Silver Corporation and changed its name to Athena Gold Corporation in January 2021. The company was incorporated in 2003 and is based in Vacaville, California.
General.Address: 2010A Harbison Drive, Vacaville, CA, United States, 95687
